LanguageData.BionicTailAnimal.label: bionic animal tail
LanguageData.BionicTailAnimal.description: An installed advanced artificial animal tail. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological tail in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicTailAnimal.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic animal tail
LanguageData.BionicEyeAnimal.label: bionic animal eye
LanguageData.BionicArmAnimal.label: bionic animal arm
LanguageData.BionicArmAnimal.description: An installed advanced artificial animal arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicArmAnimal.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic animal fist
LanguageData.BionicLegAnimal.label: bionic animal leg
LanguageData.BionicLegAnimal.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic animal leg

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticTailAnimal.label: prosthetic animal tail
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticTailAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal tail. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's tail.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLegAnimal.label: prosthetic animal leg
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLegAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal leg. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's leg.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArmAnimal.label: prosthetic animal arm
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArmAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal arm. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's arm.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHeartAnimal.label: prosthetic animal heart
LanguageData.CochlearImplantAnimal.label: animal cochlear implant
LanguageData.CochlearImplantAnimal.description: An installed animal cochlear implant. An external microphone transmits a sound signal to electrodes wrapped around the inner ear's auditory sensing nerves. The electrodes stimulate the nerves according to the sound, creating a sensation of hearing. It's not as good as a natural ear, but it's a lot better than being deaf. Fits all animals.
LanguageData.SyntheticLungAnimal.label: synthetic animal lung
LanguageData.SyntheticLiverAnimal.label: synthetic animal liver
LanguageData.SyntheticKidneyAnimal.label: synthetic animal kidney
LanguageData.LightReceptorAnimal.label: animal light receptor
LanguageData.SimpleSpineAnimal.label: replacement animal spine
LanguageData.SimpleSpineAnimal.description: An installed simple replacement animal spine. Highly advanced for its time, can be considered as an early bionic prototype with the first sophisticated application of neural interface in a prosthesis. Still, it is inferior to a real spine.
LanguageData.HydraulicJawAnimal.label: hydraulic animal jaw
LanguageData.HydraulicJawAnimal.description: An installed hydraulic animal jaw. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Food is crushed and chewed more efficiently.
LanguageData.HydraulicJawAnimal.comps.0.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.ArtificialNoseAnimal.label: artificial animal nose
LanguageData.ArtificialNoseAnimal.description: An installed artificial animal nose. Used to cover where the missing nose was on the face.

LanguageData.SurrogateStomachAnimal.label: surrogate animal stomach
LanguageData.SurrogateLiverAnimal.label: surrogate animal liver
LanguageData.SurrogateKidneyAnimal.label: surrogate animal kidney

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHandAnimal.label: prosthetic animal hand
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHandAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal hand. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's hand.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFingerAnimal.label: prosthetic animal finger
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFingerAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal finger. Not terribly efficient and certainly not comfortable, but gets the job done.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFootAnimal.label: prosthetic animal foot
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFootAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal foot. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's foot.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToeAnimal.label: prosthetic animal toe
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToeAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal toe. Inefficient and uncomfortable, they generate a lot of noise while walking, but they get the job done.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticPawAnimal.label: prosthetic animal paw
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticPawAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal paw. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's paw.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHoofAnimal.label: prosthetic animal hoof
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHoofAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal hoof. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's hoof.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClawAnimal.label: prosthetic animal claw
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClawAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal claw. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's claw.
LanguageData.BionicForearmAnimal.label: bionic animal forearm
LanguageData.BionicForearmAnimal.description: An installed advanced artificial animal forearm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological forearm in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicInternalSupportAnimal.label: bionic animal internal support
LanguageData.BionicInternalSupportAnimal.description: An installed bionic animal internal support.
LanguageData.Bionic_RG_FootClaw.label: bionic animal foot claw
LanguageData.Bionic_RG_FootClaw.description: An installed bionic animal foot claw.
LanguageData.Bionic_RG_FootClaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: bionic foot claw
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticForearmAnimal.label: prosthetic animal forearm
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticForearmAnimal.descriptio: An installed prosthetic animal forearm. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's forearm.
LanguageData.SimpleProsthetic_RG_FootClaw.label: prosthetic animal foot claw
LanguageData.SimpleProsthetic_RG_FootClaw.description: An installed prosthetic animal foot claw.
LanguageData.WoodenWingAnimal.label: wooden animal wing
LanguageData.WoodenWingAnimal.description: An installed wooden animal wing. Allows the user to fly again, albeit not very well.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticWingAnimal.label: prosthetic animal wing
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticWingAnimal.description: An installed prosthetic animal wing. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints and artifical membrane allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real animal's wing.
LanguageData.BionicWingAnimal.label: bionic animal wing
LanguageData.BionicWingAnimal.description: An installed bionic animal wing. With its biogel nerve-link, lightweight synthetic membrane, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological wing in almost every way. Fits all animals.
